verses.text: Go \w to|strong="G0071"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \add ye\add* rich \w men|strong="G4145"\w*, \w weep|strong="G2799"\w* and \w howl|strong="G3649"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w miseries|strong="G5004"\w* that shall come \w upon|strong="G1904"\w* \add you\add*.

\w Your|strong="G5216"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* are \w corrupted|strong="G4595"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* \w are|strong="G1096"\w* \w motheaten|strong="G4598"\w*.

\w Your|strong="G5216"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w silver|strong="G0696"\w* is \w cankered|strong="G2728"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w rust|strong="G2447"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w witness|strong="G3142"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*. Ye have heaped treasure \w together|strong="G2343"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w hire|strong="G3408"\w* of the \w labourers|strong="G2040"\w* who \w have|strong="G3588"\w* reaped \w down|strong="G0270"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w fields|strong="G5561"\w*, which is \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* kept back by \w fraud|strong="G0650"\w*, \w crieth|strong="G2896"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w cries|strong="G0995"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which have \w reaped|strong="G2325"\w* are \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w sabaoth|strong="G4519"\w*.

Ye have lived in \w pleasure|strong="G5171"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* been \w wanton|strong="G4684"\w*; ye have \w nourished|strong="G5142"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w slaughter|strong="G4967"\w*.

Ye have \w condemned|strong="G2613"\w* \add and\add* \w killed|strong="G5407"\w* the \w just|strong="G1342"\w*; \add and\add* he \w doth|strong="G0498"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w resist|strong="G0498"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

Be \w patient|strong="G3114"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w husbandman|strong="G1092"\w* waiteth \w for|strong="G1551"\w* the \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, and hath long \w patience|strong="G3114"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* he \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w early|strong="G4406"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w latter|strong="G3797"\w* \w rain|strong="G5205"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G3114"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w patient|strong="G3114"\w*; \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* draweth \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w*.

\w Grudge|strong="G4727"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* one \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* ye be \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w*: \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w judge|strong="G4253"\w* \w standeth|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* the \w door|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w Take|strong="G2983"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* have \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* in the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, for an \w example|strong="G5262"\w* of suffering \w affliction|strong="G2552"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, we \w count|strong="G3106"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w happy|strong="G3106"\w* which \w endure|strong="G5278"\w*. Ye have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* of the \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* of \w Job|strong="G2492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* very \w pitiful|strong="G4184"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of tender \w mercy|strong="G3629"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w above|strong="G4253"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w swear|strong="G3660"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* by \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* by the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* by \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w oath|strong="G3727"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G2277"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w* \w be|strong="G2277"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add your\add* \w nay|strong="G3756"\w*, \w nay|strong="G3756"\w*; \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G5272"\w*.

\w Is|strong="G2553"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w afflicted|strong="G2553"\w*? let him \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*. \w Is|strong="G2114"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w merry|strong="G2114"\w*? let him sing \w psalms|strong="G5567"\w*.

\w Is|strong="G0770"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w sick|strong="G0770"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? let him \w call|strong="G4341"\w* for the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let them \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w anointing|strong="G0218"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* with \w oil|strong="G1637"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w prayer|strong="G2171"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* shall \w save|strong="G4982"\w* the \w sick|strong="G2577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*; and \w if|strong="G2579"\w* he have \w committed|strong="G4160"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w they|strong="G0863"\w* shall \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w forgiven|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Confess|strong="G1843"\w* \add your\add* \w faults|strong="G3900"\w* one to \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pray|strong="G2172"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* ye may be \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*. The effectual \w fervent|strong="G1754"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* of a righteous \w man|strong="G1342"\w* \w availeth|strong="G2480"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* subject to like \w passions|strong="G3663"\w* as we \w are|strong="G2254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w earnestly|strong="G4335"\w* that it \w might|strong="G1026"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w rain|strong="G1026"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w rained|strong="G1026"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* by the space of \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w years|strong="G1763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w rain|strong="G5205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* brought \w forth|strong="G0985"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* do \w err|strong="G4105"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w convert|strong="G1994"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;

Let him \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he which \w converteth|strong="G1994"\w* the \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w error|strong="G4106"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* shall \w save|strong="G4982"\w* a \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w hide|strong="G2572"\w* a \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.
